data.title: James Bond's New $35 Million Wheels
data.meta_description: Aston Martin outbid BMW to get its $228,000 V12 Vanquish a feature role the next 007 flick. Can it be worth the money?
data.text:
Aston Martin outbid BMW to get its $228,000 V12 Vanquish a feature role the next 007 flick. Can it be worth the money?

By Ron Grover

In Hollywood, the biggest car crashes sometimes aren't on the screen (despite what The Fast & the Furious might have you believe). The movie industry recently saw some expensive fenders crumble when Aston Martin and BMW both went after the rights to be James Bond's official car in the next installment of the British-spy, sexy-babe, hot-set-of-wheels franchise.
